title: Does piano playing really improves IQ? - Quora

response.answer_text: You may say so. Playing the piano improves the balance between the two hemispheres of your brain. Therefore, improves the neural connections responsible for an objective and clear thinking. Once you’re able to better perceive all the information around you, understand it, connect it with previous knowledge and built something new and creative from that, you can say your IQ was increased. But it will only happen if you go deep into music learning and piano playing. And even more, if you enjoy every step of the way. Otherwise, the results will be too shallow and you may not realize the difference. Let me know if I can help you any further.

Any brain work helps to maintain or even to increase your brain’s possibilities. Piano playing includes a lot of senses and various intellectual ways of thinking. But don’t overestimate it: You have to love what you do, also the times of struggle, that surely will appear, this is what takes you forward really.
It has been observed scientifically that playing any musical instrument for a period of time does increase fluid intelligence of oneself so it helps in improving the IQ.
Studies have shown that in can increase IQ. The link to the study is at the bottom of the article: 15 Ways Music Helps Your Child
